00010 ostream& RTPHeader::toStream(ostream& os) {
00011         char value[SIZE_IN_BYTES];
00012 
00013         value[0] = ((v << 6) & 0xc0) | ((((quint8) p) << 5) & 0x20)
00014                         | ((((quint8) x) << 4) & 0x10) | (cc & 0x0f);
00015         value[1] = (((((quint8) m) << 7) & 0x80) | (pt & 0x7f));
00016 
00017         value[2] = (sequenceNumber >> 8) & 0xFF;
00018         value[3] = (sequenceNumber) & 0xFF;
00019 
00020         value[4] = (timestamp >> 24) & 0xFF;
00021         value[5] = (timestamp >> 16) & 0xFF;
00022         value[6] = (timestamp >> 8) & 0xFF;
00023         value[7] = (timestamp) & 0xFF;
00024 
00025         value[8] = (ssrc >> 24) & 0xFF;
00026         value[9] = (ssrc >> 16) & 0xFF;
00027         value[10] = (ssrc >> 8) & 0xFF;
00028         value[11] = (ssrc) & 0xFF;
00029         os.write(value, SIZE_IN_BYTES);
00030         return os;
00031 }
00032 
00033 string RTPHeader::toString() {
00034         ostringstream oss;
00035         toStream(oss);
00036         return oss.str();
00037 }

00042 
00043 RTPHeader::RTPHeader(char* data) {
00044         v = ((data[0] >> 6) & 0x03);
00045         p = ((data[0] >> 5) & 0x01);
00046         x = ((data[0] >> 4) & 0x01);
00047         cc = ((data[0]) & 0x0F);
00048         m = ((data[1] >> 7) & 0x01);
00049         pt = ((data[1] >> 1) & 0x7f);
00050         sequenceNumber = data[2];
00051         timestamp = data[4];
00052         ssrc = data[8];
00053 }
00054 
00055 RTPHeader::RTPHeader() :
00056         v(USED_RTP_VERSION), p(false), x(false), cc(0), m(false), pt(G711_PCMU),
00057                         sequenceNumber(1), timestamp(0), ssrc(0) {
00058         sequenceNumberCycle = 0;
00059 }

00063                         another.pt), sequenceNumber(another.sequenceNumber), timestamp(
00064                         another.timestamp), ssrc(another.ssrc) {
00065         sequenceNumberCycle = another.sequenceNumberCycle;
00066 }

00075 RTPHeader::RTPHeader(SampleRate _sampleRate, quint16 _sequenceNumber,
00076                 quint32 _timestamp, quint32 _ssrc) :
00077         v(2), p(true), x(false), cc(0), m(false), pt(G711_PCMU), sequenceNumber(
00078                         _sequenceNumber), timestamp(_timestamp), ssrc(_ssrc) {

00082 RTPHeader & RTPHeader::operator=(const RTPHeader& another) {
00083         v = another.v;
00084         p = another.p;
00085         x = another.x;
00086         cc = another.cc;
00087         m = another.m;
00088         pt = another.pt;
00089         sequenceNumber = another.sequenceNumber;
00090         timestamp = another.timestamp;
00091         ssrc = another.ssrc;
00092         sequenceNumberCycle = another.sequenceNumberCycle;
00093         return *this;
00094 }

00096 //***********************************************
00097 void RTPHeader::nextRTPHeader(SampleRate _sampleRate) {
00098         int difference = 0;
00099         // change pt (payload type) and timestamp
00100         if (_sampleRate == NARROW_BAND) {
00101                 if (timestamp + TIMESTAMP_INTERVAL_8KHZ <= UINT_MAX) {
00102                         timestamp += TIMESTAMP_INTERVAL_8KHZ;
00103                 } else {
00104                         difference = UINT_MAX - timestamp;
00105                         timestamp = TIMESTAMP_INTERVAL_8KHZ - difference - 1; // count from zero
00106                 }
00107         } else { // if(_sampleRate == WIDE_BAND)
00108                 if (timestamp + TIMESTAMP_INTERVAL_16KHZ <= UINT_MAX) {
00109                         timestamp += TIMESTAMP_INTERVAL_16KHZ;
00110                 } else {
00111                         difference = UINT_MAX - timestamp;
00112                         timestamp = TIMESTAMP_INTERVAL_16KHZ - difference - 1; // count from zero
00113                 }
00114         }
00115         // change sequence number
00116         if (sequenceNumber + 1 > USHRT_MAX) {
00117                 sequenceNumber = 0;
00118                 ++sequenceNumberCycle;
00119         } else {
00120                 ++sequenceNumber;
00121         }
00122 
00123 }

00125 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& str, RTPHeader head) {
00126         str << "Version: " << (unsigned) head.v << std::endl;
00127         str << "Padding: " << (bool) head.p << std::endl;
00128         str << "Extension: " << head.x << std::endl;
00129         str << "CSRC Count: " << (unsigned) head.cc << std::endl;
00130         str << "Marker: " << head.m << std::endl;
00131         str << "Payload Type: " << (unsigned) head.pt << std::endl;
00132         str << "Sequence Number: " << head.sequenceNumber << std::endl;
00133         str << "Timestamp: " << head.timestamp << std::endl;
00134         str << "SSRC: " << head.ssrc << std::endl;
00135 
00136         return str;
00137 }

00139 //***********************************************
00140 quint16 RTPHeader::generateSequenceNumber() {
00141         srand(time(NULL));
00142         return (quint16) (rand() % USHRT_MAX + 1); // unsigned short max value
00143 }
00144 
00145 //***********************************************
00146 quint32 RTPHeader::generateTimestamp() {
00147         srand(time(NULL));
00148         return (quint32) (rand() % ULONG_MAX + 1); // unsigned long max value
00149 }
00150 
00151 //***********************************************
00152 quint32 RTPHeader::generateSSRC() {
00153         srand(time(NULL));
00154         return (quint32) (rand() % ULONG_MAX + 1); // unsigned long max value
00155 }
